name: Pocket Smash Out
overview: Pocket Smash Out is based on the classic multi-level arcade / puzzle game ‘BREAKOUT’ with the various levels all themed with exciting Manga graphics. The levels become progressively harder as you work your way through all of the 16+ levels. There are over 90 different brick layout patterns in the Championship and with the harder levels being kept till last there is more than enough challenge for even the most experienced player. The object of the game is to ‘fire’ your ball at the bricks and catch it on the rebound (watch out for those bonus balls !!) and progress to the next level.
